title: AceTheOnlyOne
author: AceTheOnlyOne
content: I’m looking for help with my project building a block chain for an app and developing the app for the market please let me know the app will be just to jump Off point.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: AceTheOnlyOne on June 26, 2022, 01:19:20 PMI’m looking for help with my project building a block chain for an app and developing the app for the market please let me know the app will be just to jump Off point. First of all this is a wrong board to ask suggestion.Second, unless you are serious about what you are saying, at least not giving much useful information I do not think anyone will really be interested to spend time to write you back.Project Development board could be a good choice for you. Please move it there.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: In addition to what Bitcoingirl.Club posted above;If you're looking for someone to help you build an app or some other service related to your project; make a more detailed thread in the Services section, stating what services you need and how much you're willing to pay for it.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I can help you. Reach me on Telegram: @EllyElllyliosReal

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: AceTheOnlyOne on June 26, 2022, 01:19:20 PMI’m looking for help with my project building a block chain for an app and developing the app for the market please let me know the app will be just to jump Off point. Is it an Android app or an IOS?What is the benefit of the application? We do not trust closed source applications, and since you will not make the application open source, why does your “blockchain” need an application and not a website?Is the application a new cryptocurrency or are you thinking of using the blockchain outside the traditional system.The market is not in a good position at the moment, so unless you have done your marketing calculations well, you may end up losing your money and the project's death before starting implementation.
